title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Steven Seagal was Hysterically Crying"
description: The government finds out that Steven Seagal and Peter Gotti have been having some conversations, so Steven gets asked to testify in court. It wasn't until after a good cry and a couple of hugs that Steven could even take the stand.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: The government finds out that Steven Seagal and Peter Gotti have been having some conversations, so Steven gets asked to testify in court. It wasn't until after a good cry and a couple of hugs that Steven could even take the stand.
